## <!-- Based on: https://github.com/github/awesome-copilot/blob/main/instructions/code-review-generic.instructions.md -->

## description: "Code review standards for Jekyll static sites."

# Code Review Guidelines

- Review all changes for clarity, maintainability, and adherence to project standards.
- Check for semantic HTML, accessible markup, and valid Liquid syntax.
- Ensure CSS and JS changes do not break existing functionality.
- Request changes or clarifications as needed before approving.
